title: @Riot Playing for 5 years, still never had PBE Access
body:
This Urgot is my main account

It has said application received since Season 3

why have I still not gotten any access when I see other people get it in the first couple months of playing

replies.body: I do see that the account in question applied quite a bit ago!  There's really nothing we can do to expedite or force applications through though.  I couldn't tell you why you haven't been accepted yet beyond the information provided in our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  Though you've waited for a while, I still wish you the best of luck with admissions!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kINy2e77,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-10T21:20:55.699+0000)
>
>  I couldn't tell you why you haven't been accepted yet beyond the information provided in our [PBE FAQ]

Why can you not tell me why my account has not been approved yet?
Quite honestly, because we don't know.  Player support is not part of QA or testing the game, and we do not select who is admitted to the PBE.  Hope that helps clear things up.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kINy2e77,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-11T00:10:06.723+0000)
>
> Quite honestly, because we don't know.  Player support is not part of QA or testing the game, and we do not select who is admitted to the PBE.  Hope that helps clear things up.

"we don' t know, hope that clears up"

not calling shit on you, i understand in a workplace environment you do not know what everyone does and how everything works especially regarding responsability, but how you worded cracks me up xD

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kINy2e77,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-11T00:10:06.723+0000)
>
> Quite honestly, because we don't know.  Player support is not part of QA or testing the game, and we do not select who is admitted to the PBE.  Hope that helps clear things up.

Who would know?

They're looking for "highly active, non-toxic League of Legends players with a positive effect on the community and who are good feedback-givers."

Play more, be less toxic, fill out their surveys and become one of the streamers seems to be the recipe for success. Don't feel bad about not getting in─there's  many more who haven't gotten in.

One of the things you could try is being the main of a champion they might rework at some point (Urgot mains?), but even then there's no guarantee they even want you testing the new champion/rework. 

Best thing to do is forget about it entirely and be pleasantly surprised if you ever see a PBE e-mail in your folders.

> [{quoted}](name=Elphege,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kINy2e77,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-11T01:09:37.952+0000)
>
> They're looking for "highly active, non-toxic League of Legends players with a positive effect on the community and who are good feedback-givers."
> 
> Play more, be less toxic, fill out their surveys and become one of the streamers seems to be the recipe for success. Don't feel bad about not getting in─there's  many more who haven't gotten in.
> 
> One of the things you could try is being the main of a champion they might rework at some point (Urgot mains?), but even then there's no guarantee they even want you testing the new champion/rework. 
> 
> Best thing to do is forget about it entirely and be pleasantly surprised if you ever see a PBE e-mail in your folders.

I am an urgot main lol http://imgur.com/a/taoYj
